feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.26-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Apply theme before running tests so the DC variable is set up. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2054

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.26-1...v2025.07.26-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.26-3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Re-work the logging functions by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2055
  • Rename strip_log_colors to strip_ansi_colors, and use it for argu… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2056
  • Change strip_ansi_colors to use a herestring instead of printf by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2057
  • Add strip_dialog_colors function and use it in question_prompt by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2058
  • Update strip_ansi_colors and strip_dialog_colors by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2059
  • Strip ANSI colors from dialog boxes in question_prompt by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2060
  • Convert \n to newlines in log messages by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2061
  • Colorize the prompt in appvars_purge for both CLI and GUI usage by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2062
  • Replace another echo -e with printf '%b\n in the logging function by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2063
  • Move the cursor to bottom of screen on cleanup if using the GUI by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.26-2...v2025.07.26-3

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.26-4

What's Changed

  • Change GUI subtitles of command to show the command-line instead of p… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2065

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.28-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make apply_theme return an exit code, and check it on calls. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2067
  • Fix all references to depreciated to use the correct term deprecated by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2068
  • Show the "nicename" of apps as they are discovered for the app select… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2069
  • Create an app_nicename_pipe function and use it in menu_app_select by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2070
  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.6.16 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2066
  • Create app_is_runnable, app_filter_runnable and `app_filter_runna… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2071
  • Fix app_is_runnable for instances of apps. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2072
  • Optimize app_filter_runnable for speed by bringing the `app_is_runn… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2073
  • Replace outputting the Bottom of Screen ANSI code with ` tput reset… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2074

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.26-4...v2025.07.28-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.29-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add color to the warning about dialog not being installed. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2075
  • Only create the .env file before certain command-line options by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2076
  • Optimize app_is_deprecated and app_is_nondeprecated by avoiding c… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2077
  • Update env_sanitize to show all changed variables in a better format by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2078
  • Change notice colors by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2079
  • Add color to more notices and enclose more items in single quotes by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2080
  • Change Invalid usage. Must be to Invalid usage. Must be: by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2081
  • Update Invalid usage notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2082
  • Update one remaining Invalid usage. Must be to `Invalid usage. Must… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2083
  • Create an APPLICATION_COMMAND global variable to set the ds comma… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2084
  • Colorize more notice messages. Remove incorrect instructions to use … by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2085

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.28-1...v2025.07.29-1
